channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Greenland's opposition wins election dominated by independence and Trump
item.description: The voting was dominated by US President Donald Trump's pledge to take over Denmark's autonomous territory.

item.title: Taiwanese chip giant's investments in U.S. stir 'silicon shield' security worries
item.description: TSMC's plan to invest $100 billion into U.S. production facilities raises concerns that its leverage in securing protection from China may be weakened...

item.title: If you want more happiness in your life, ask yourself this simple question
item.description: Gretchen Rubin, host of the Happier podcast, explains the secret to happiness — and why knowing your personality type can help you make better decisio...

item.title: Trump's policies are destabilizing mental health care for veterans, sources say
item.description: The Department of Veterans Affairs is one of the largest providers of mental health care in the U.S. Its integrated care model means patients are alre...

item.title: Ship captain arrested on suspicion of manslaughter over collision with tanker

item.title: At least 100 passengers freed from Pakistan train siege
item.description: Security forces say they have killed at least 17 militant attackers in an ongoing operation.

item.title: What is known about the deadly January air crash between a passenger jet and US Army helicopter
Is Trump mulling a minerals deal with conflict-hit DR Congo?
item.description: Endowed with minerals but losing ground to rebels, the Congolese government wants to boost security.

item.title: Video of Pitt student missing in Dominican Republic may show last known images
item.description: Sudiksha Konanki went missing last week in Punta Cana and more than 300 people are searching for her.

item.title: Upset in Greenland parliamentary elections as center-right party wins
item.description: Greenland parliamentary elections produced an upset win by a party favoring gradual independence from Denmark. President Trump openly covets the vast ...

item.title: Irish, undocumented, and unsure of their future in Trump's America
item.description: They run businesses. They tend bars. They pay taxes. But still they live in fear. There are thousands of undocumented Irish immigrants in America toda...

item.title: US set to present 30-day ceasefire offer to Russia
item.description: Ukraine says it accepts the immediate truce, and it is now up to the US to convince Russia to agree to it.

item.title: America's clean-energy industry is growing despite Trump's attacks. At least for now.

item.title: CIA head, Russian spy chief speak by phone, first such contact in 27 months

item.title: 5 years since the pandemic started, long COVID patients are still hoping for a cure
item.description: They're pushing for more funding to find effective treatments. Researchers are finally starting to make headway but have a way to go.

item.title: UK seeks trade deal as Trump metal tariffs take effect
item.description: Duty on steel and aluminium imports is a major hit for some of the US's top trading partners.

item.title: Mahmoud Khalil didn’t wear a mask. He’s now the face of Trump’s crackdown on campus protests
